issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
QA is seeing failure to ping/ssh to VMs pretty often in the recent test runs. It looks like the rules are sometimes not being applied in iptables for given reservations. Launching a new instance in the same security group appears to remedy this? [~tony] has a reproducible test case to trap this (I think). 
Thanks, 
-M

{code}

fields.summary: Security groups sometimes missing rules for allowed ports.
fields.environment: 2 machines. machine1 = single front end, machine2 =node

comments.body:
Mascot (since we may never reach EUCA-90210 for EUCA-9021 get's this)
!http://i38.tinypic.com/2vs3wqa.jpg!
I'm seeing this as well from time to time. Restarting CC solves the problem.
